Title: The Search for Titan Relics
RewardText:
I have spent all of my time since the waking studying the titans. Their history is fascinating. What power they must have wielded to create the dragonflights! There is so much knowledge to be gained about them! 

If you could bring me any titan relics you find around the Dragon Isles, I will put in a good word for you with the Valdrakken Accord.
